title: ✒️ Adopt Ricardian LLC sole membership
body:
Ricardian LLC is a series llc formed and filed in Wyoming for LexDAO purposes (*tbd) 🤠. See formation docs: https://ipfs.globalupload.io/QmeS3uiATNqRNawudneXYz7aPPHy7pVj6NKDZK71FZ6JLt

Here is a form of Operating Agreement for LexDAO cooperative to sign and adopt to accept sole membership in Ricardian LLC, by means of this snapshot: https://ipfs.globalupload.io/QmbeV9wVis2tNhWPN4r6vJKbq1eqYaeA14iG2vmr9eufYY 📜

In this fashion, we would have LexDAO coop. (0x057e820D740D5AAaFfa3c6De08C5c98d990dB00d) act to manage and own Ricardian LLC "Master" (0xa375745e97E6297e7e543F1B319E1dbb6d121306), entirely on-chain, like the mages we are 🧙! 

The summoning of a special-purpose MYSTIC and allocation of Ricardian LLC digital units to LexDAO coop. can be seen here ⚡: https://etherscan.io/tx/0x778b3583258cf77be39d25dfd163ed4a1c1d2be09e00bf9cf47db1b403e61fb2
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
